text: Floating Figure is a sculpture by Gaston Lachaise. ==Casts== According to the National Gallery of Australia, seven bronze casts were made at Modern Art Foundry in Long Island City, New York, and are located at the Museum of Modern Art, the Society Hill Project in Philadelphia, the Ray Stark Collection in Beverly Hills, California, the Sheldon Museum of Art at the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in Lincoln, Nebraska, the Putnam Collection of Sculpture at Princeton University in New Jersey, and the National Gallery of Australia in Canberra. ==See also== * 1927 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:1927 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Australia Category:Bronze sculptures in California Category:Bronze sculptures in Nebraska Category:Bronze sculptures in New Jersey Category:Bronze sculptures in New York City Category:Bronze sculptures in Pennsylvania Category:Collections of the National Gallery of Australia Category:Princeton University Art Museum Category:Sculptures of the Museum of Modern Art (New York City) Category:Sculptures of women in Australia Category:Sculptures of women in California Category:Sculptures of women in Nebraska Category:Sculptures of women in New Jersey Category:Sculptures of women in New York City Category:Sculptures of women in Pennsylvania Category:Statues in Australia Category:Statues in California Category:Statues in Nebraska Category:Statues in New Jersey Category:Statues in New York City Category:Statues in Pennsylvania Category:University of Nebraska–Lincoln Category:Nude sculptures in Pennsylvania
title: Floating Figure
